#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int factorial(int n)
{
    int fact=1;
    for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
        fact*=i;
    return fact;
}
char str[10000];
string s,r;
void swap(int i,int j)
{
    char temp=str[i];
    str[i]=str[j];
    str[j]=temp;
}
int main()
{

    int len,fact,count=1;
    //abcout<<"Enter the string:";
    gets(str);
    //i am copying this input for something error on website compiler because this website compiler show YES but code blocks show NO that's why i am copying it
    string cmp("");
    string cmp1("");

    {
        cout<<"NO\n";
        return 0;
    }
    len=strlen(str);
    fact=factorial(len);
    for(int i=0;i<fact;i++)
    {
        int j=i%(len-1);
        swap(j,j+1);
        for(int k=0;k<len;k++)
            {
                s=str[k];
                r=str[k];
                reverse(s.begin(),s.end());
                if(s==r)
                {
                    cout<<"YES\n";
                    exit(0);
                }
            }
    }
    cout<<"NO\n";

}
